name: letter
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: letter
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a written message from one person to another, usually put in an envelope and sent by post

example.eg: I got a letter from the bank this morning.
example.egtrans: 今天早晨我收到了一封银行的来函。

dsense.name: letter
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: any of the set of symbols used to write a language, representing a sound in the language

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: the exact words of the law and not its more important general meaning

name: letter
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: used to refer to a standard size of paper in the US, 8.5 inches by 11 inches
trans_examp.trans_cn: （美国）标准信纸（长11英寸，宽8.5英寸）

example.eg: Fliers are usually printed either on letter size or legal size paper.
example.egtrans: 印传单的纸一般是标准信纸或法律规格纸。
